Definition¶

class avocado.meta.models.Definition(*args, **kwargs)¶

Describes the significance and/or meaning behind some data. In addition, it defines the natural key of the Django field that represents the location of some data e.g. library.book.title within a data model.

choices¶

Returns a distinct set of choices for this field.

datatype¶

Returns the datatype of the field this definition represents.

By default, it will use the field’s internal type, but can be overridden by the INTERNAL_DATATYPE_MAP setting.

field¶

Returns the field object this Definition represents.

formfield(**kwargs)¶

Returns the default formfield class for the represented field instance in addition to a few helper arguments for the constructor.

model¶

Returns the model class this Definition is associated with.

values¶

Introspects the data and returns a distinct list of the values.
